summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 20 October to end of Thursday 21 October GMT
description: Unsettled weather fronts arriving from the Atlantic. The resulting strong winds will give good atmospheric mixing and quick dispersal of local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
